title: भारतीय सेना द्वारा 7 वर्षीय पाकिस्तानी बच्चे का शव सौंपने की तस्वीर झूठे दावे से साझा
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim:
Indian Army like a boss,told pakistanis to come with a white flag & take the dead bodies!

White flag is raised in surrender! This picture takes me back to 1971 where 93,000 Pakistanis raised white flag & Surrendered to the Indian Army!#IndianarmyinKashmirpic.twitter.com/bn5dPfdUzW
